tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE WaterConsumptionLevels (
    RegionID INT,
    RegionName VARCHAR(255),
    WaterConsumption DECIMAL(10, 2)
)

CREATE TABLE water_consumption (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    region_id INT,
    consumption DECIMAL(10, 2),
    consumption_date DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (region_id) REFERENCES regions(id)
);

CREATE TABLE conservation_efforts (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    region_id INT,
    conservation_type VARCHAR(255),
    conservation_date DATE,
    conservation_description TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (region_id) REFERENCES regions(id)
);
CREATE TABLE region (region_id INT, region_name VARCHAR(50), total_water_consumed DECIMAL(10, 2) );
CREATE TABLE city (city_id INT, city_name VARCHAR(50), region_id INT, water_consumed DECIMAL(10, 2) );
CREATE TABLE household (household_id INT, city_id INT, water_consumed DECIMAL(10, 2), household_size INT );
CREATE TABLE water_source (source_id INT, city_id INT, source_type VARCHAR(50), source_capacity DECIMAL(10, 2) );
CREATE TABLE conservation_efforts (effort_id INT, region_id INT, city_id INT, conservation_method VARCHAR(100) );
